content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Identify the likely purpose of the poster. b) Explain one development that led to the initiative shown in the image. c) Explain one reason that Ukraine would be a particular focus for propaganda such as this image.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
